attributes.review: I washed my phone with soap and water after I deleted the app. Then I disinfected it with Lysol wipes and left it under the UV light for a day. Avoid at all cost.
attributes.title: Stained my finger orange

attributes.review: I downloaded the app thinking that it was going to allow me to support my favorite president of all time but I was sadly mistaken. Every single time I navigated one of the rally events the app crashed, and it constantly signs me out each time I open the app. I am very upset and utterly disappointed.
attributes.title: Disappointed.
